title: Bugalugs Dog Shampoo Bath Brush & Cat Brush, use wet or dry as dog grooming brush for grooming & bathing use alongside our dog no rinse shampoo for smelly dogs & cats (Black (2 Pack))

features: What a smooth operator! Our flexible and soft latex-free palm brush with rubber dimples is durable, waterproof and comfortable to hold, bending to fit the natural contours of your hand and made from premium quality materials. Ideal dog accessories for small dogs and for use alongside your most loved grooming products for dogs and dog washing equipment. Our dog grooming comb increases the effectiveness of shampoo lathering, allowing less product to go further, while also achieving a deeper clean than solely using shampoo

Multipurpose brush ideal for grooming & bathing - The Bugalugs dog bath brush and cat grooming brush is effective at assisting in your pet wash, deep cleaning the coat while the bristles effectively massage the skin, and as dog brushes for grooming and dog brushes for shedding. The split ends of the rubber teeth remove pet hair without tugging, holding onto the fur and helping to prevent excess hair and mess. To remove hair from the brush, simply turn upside down and tap while gently pulling the hair away from the bristles

Deep cleaning massaging silicone dog brush bristles - The rubber teeth massage and stimulate skin and blood flow, effectively removing loose fur. Suitable for kittens, puppy, dogs and cats of all sizes from small, medium and large, the natural stroking action helps to create a bond with your pet, removing loose and dead hair and stimulating the skin and the natural oils in the coat. Our cat grooming brush and dog shampoo brush is comfortable and does not damage the fur

Soft four-point rubber brush head - Bugalugs dog shower brush is much gentler on your pet than a coarse hard dog washing brush and is an alternative to metal bristled pet hair brush and pet grooming brush. Our hand-held pet bath brush is a great alternative to dog washing gloves, dog grooming glove and cat grooming glove, and is easy to clean and easy to use - simply hang to dry after use!

For best results, use alongside our best-selling range of dog cleaning products, cat accessories, dog supplies and pet shampoo, including - dog shampoo and conditioner, dog wipes, dog dry shampoo, cat wipes, paw cleaner for dogs, dog drying robe, dog towel and dog stuff and cat bath products
description: Product description The Bugalugs Bath Brush can be used for all sizes and breeds of cats and dogs. The latex-free rubber bristles help to remove loose hair and dirt whilst gently massaging your pet's skin for a deep cleaning action. Our cat and dog grooming brush are suitable for use both wet and dry, which makes it ideal for use at bath time as a dog bath brush alongside our Bugalugs dog shampoo, dog shampoo for smelly dogs, dog shampoo and conditioner, dog dry shampoo, cat shampoo, and grooming products for cats. Our effective yet gentle dog grooming brushes can be used as a dog brush for short hair and as a de shedding brush for dogs, removing dirt and loose fur from your cat or dog and providing a deep clean when used alongside your favourite Bugalugs dog grooming shampoo, Bugalugs Dry Shampoo for dogs, dog perfume spray, puppy shampoo from 12 weeks, puppy shampoo from 8 weeks, no rinse dog shampoo, cat perfume and shampoo for cats. For use wet and dry, the rubber bristles are safe and comfortable for even those pets with sensitive skin, making your dog grooming bath a relaxing experience. With an ergonomic oval shape, our handheld grooming brush fits comfortably in the palm of your hand and is held with a rubber loop handle allowing for a cleaner brushing experience that is effective and efficient. How to use: Soak your pet's coat with water. Apply your choice of Bugalugs shampoo and lather, massage into your pet’s coat with the bugalugs bath brush, shampoo brush and cat hair brush for a deep cleanse. Rinse thoroughly after washing and dry, or for an even softer coat repeat with Bugalugs conditioner. Can also be used dry with Bugalugs no rinse shampoos. Simply apply foam and brush in the direction of hair growth to remove loose hair and debris whilst instantly refreshing your pet's coat. Rinse brush after use and dry. Directions Soak your pet’s coat with water. Apply your choice of Bugalugs Shampoo and lather, massage into your pets coat with the Bugalugs Bath Brush for a deep cleanse. Rinse thoroughly and dry, or for an even softer coat repeat with Bugalugs Conditioner. Can also be used dry with Bugalugs No Rinse Shampoos. Simply apply foam and brush in the direction of hair growth to remove loose hair and debris whilst instantly refreshing your pet’s coat. Rinse brush after use and dry.
